account_not_approved: Your account has not been approved yet.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
logged_in_as_seller: You are logged in as a seller
logout_message: You have been successfully logged out.
slogan: Manage your store and products with ease.
error_weight_or_volume_required: Please enter either Weight or Volume.
view_orders_description: View all orders for this store
Are you sure you want to change the orde: Are you sure you want to change the order status?
Are you sure you want to delete this ord: Are you sure you want to delete this order?
fill_in_all_fields: Please fill in all price fields before saving.
store_reviews_description: View and respond to customer reviews
store_id_missing: Store ID is missing. Cannot display reviews.
no_reviews_yet: No reviews for this store yet.
failed_to_load_reviews: Failed to load reviews. Please try again.
store_reviews_subtitle: View and respond to customer feedback
chat_will_be_here: Chat related to this ticket will be displayed here.
customer_support_description: Contact support or view your tickets
fill_all_ticket_fields: Please fill in the ticket title and description.
pull_to_refresh_or_create: Pull down to refresh or create a new ticket using the '+' button in the top right corner.
something_went_wrong_ticket: An error occurred while creating the ticket.
ticket_description_placeholder: Enter a detailed description of the problem
ticket_not_found_details: Ticket details not found or the ticket does not exist.
store_id_not_found_seller: Store ID not found for this seller.
loyalty_settings_update_failed_all: All loyalty settings update attempts failed.
Error: The start date cannot be after th: The start date cannot be after the end date.
help_select_order: Enter here the ID of the order for which you need customer support assistance.
help_send_orders: Tap here to enter selection and submission mode for orders.
help_sorting: Sort orders by date – newest or oldest first.
help_sorting_toggle: Tap the button to switch the order sorting direction – from newest to oldest and vice versa.
Store Details: By clicking this field, you can view details about your store, including its products, and you can also add new ones.
adjust_quantity_tutorial: Here you can view the current stock levels of your products and manually adjust them if needed. Use the buttons on the right to increase or decrease the quantity, or tap on the value itself to edit it directly using the keyboard.
SaveInventoryUpdate: Clicking this button will save the updated stock quantities for your products.
date_picker_loyalty: Use this section to choose the report period. Tap each date to change the range and then press 'Apply Filter' to see updated data.
Store Performance Report: This section shows your total store income for the selected period.
Generated Points Report: Here you see how many points were distributed to customers and how much they cost you.
Point Income Report: This section shows how many points were used by buyers and how much compensation you received in return.
edit_points: Here you can update the loyalty point rates for each product. Tap a product to adjust its settings.
help_product_name_and_price: Here you can input the price and name of your product.
help_product_weight: Here you can enter the weight and/or volume of your product.
help_add_product_button: By pressing this button, you can add a new product.
help_products_list: All products registered for your store will appear here.
help_retail_price: Here you can edit the retail price.
help_wholesale_price: Here you can edit the wholesale price.
help_availability_togle: Here you can change the product availability.
help_save_product_details: By clicking this button, you save the changes.
You can change the status of the order h: You can change the status of the order here.
help_pregled_ticketa_add_button: Click here to create a new support ticket.
help_pregled_ticketa_no_tickets: If you have no tickets, this message will be displayed. You can pull the list to refresh or create a new ticket using the '+' button.
help_pregled_ticketa_card: This is a display of one of your tickets. Click on the card for more details and communication.
help_kreiraj_ticket_select_order: In this field, select the order ID for which you need customer support.
help_kreiraj_ticket_subject: Enter the subject (topic) of your problem or query.
help_kreiraj_ticket_description: Describe in detail the problem or question you have.
help_kreiraj_ticket_submit_button: When you have filled all the fields, click here to send the ticket.
help_pregled_reviews_card: This is a display of a review. You can read the comment and respond to it.
help_pregled_reviews_no_reviews: If there are no reviews for your store, this message will be displayed.
help_pregled_reviews_refresh: Pull the list down to refresh the reviews.
Logout Button: Clicking this button will log you out of the application and return you to the Login screen.
